Fort_Wayne.Washington Township, Allen County, India:
Washington Township is one of twenty townships in Allen County, Indiana, United States. As of the 2010 census, its population was 36,092.


== Geography ==
Washington Township covers an area of 31.74 square miles (82.21 km2); 0.062 square miles (0.16 km2), or 0.20 percent of this is water.
